tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    rainfall FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyDemand (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    demand FLOAT,
    forecast FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE GridOperations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_date DATE,
    operation_type VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    city_id INT,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (city_id, date)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_demand (
    region_id INT,
    date DATE,
    demand FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (region_id, date)
)

CREATE TABLE grid_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    operation_type VARCHAR(255),
    region_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
    city_id INT,
    date DATE,
    forecasted_demand FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (city_id, date)
)

CREATE TABLE grid_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(50),
    operation_type VARCHAR(50),
    operation_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    operation_end_time TIMESTAMP
);
